Key Match Events: Willy Adames hit a three-run home run, his third home run of the series.
Spencer Steer hit a two RBI single in the fifth inning.
Amed Rosario hit a two-run home run to tie the game at four, his first home run since April 17th.
Blake Perkins made a game-saving catch by bringing back a potential home run hit by Noelvi Marte.
Jackson Chourio hit an opposite-field go-ahead home run in the ninth inning.
Jake Bauers made a game-saving diving play against Ty France to end the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Reds have lost 37 of their last 50 games to the Brewers.
The Reds are 11-26 in one-run games.
The Reds are 19-23 against the NL Central.
The Reds are 12-49 when allowing five runs or more.
